divs: Sighting DetailsSmoking a cig looking into the starless dark clouds when I notice a faint globe above my neighbors house. It was moving at incredible speed was almost see-thru changing all sorts of colors. Making drastic movements as if it was unefected by wind or gravity. It was only visible for 20 or 30 sec but I can't explain what I saw.
Summary: Smoking a cig looking into the starless dark clouds when I notice a faint globe above my neighbors house. It was moving at incredible speed was almost see-thru changing all sorts of colors. Making drastic movements as if it was unefected by wind and gravi
